title: Here's the biggest news you missed this weekend
description: USWNT, World Cup, Trump lawyer, Mike Pence, Jamie Raskin, Disneyland, Ohio election, O'Shae Sibley, Russia, Jamie Foxx, Simone Biles, Mega Millions drawing

title: Vivek Ramaswamy calls Juneteenth 'useless' 2 months after posting a video celebrating it
description: During a conversation with Iowa voters on Saturday, Vivek Ramaswamy suggested canceling Juneteenth, calling it a “useless” holiday.

title: Mother who was accused by Southwest of trafficking her biracial daughter files federal discrimination suit
description: A white mother who was suspected of trafficking her biracial daughter in October 2021 by Southwest Airlines employees has filed a racial discrimination suit against the company.

title: Trump may have committed 'a technical violation of the Constitution,' not a crime, his lawyer says
description: Former President Donald Trump lawyer John Lauro previews his criminal defense in 2020 election indictment on NBC’s “Meet the Press."

title: Russia strikes blood transfusion center as world leaders meet to discuss peace
description: A Russian “guided air bomb” hit a blood transfusion center in northeast Ukraine Saturday night, killing two people and injuring four, Ukrainian officials said.

title: Angus Cloud's mother clarifies she does not believe her son died by suicide
description: Angus Cloud's mother clarified that she does not believe her son died by suicide, offering insight into his last day with a statement posted to Facebook Friday night.

title: A Mississippi community takes on a U.K. energy giant over pollution concerns
description: During the last weeks of July, a handful of residents from Gloster, a majority-Black, low-income community in southwest Mississippi, prepared for a meeting with Drax Group, a U.K.-based energy company that operates a wood pellet production plant in the small town.

title: Big, hot steel boxes: Warehouses are booming as summers heat up and safety rules lag
description: As e-commerce hastens a warehousing boom in some of the hottest parts of the U.S., regulations have struggled to keep up with growing workplace heat risks.

title: Forget the lantern fly. A mysterious new pest has scientists sounding the alarm.
description: Beech leaf disease has quietly raced across the country infecting a particular species of tree critical to forest ecosystems, the American beech.

title: High-stakes Ohio ballot measure sets the stage for another hostile Senate race
description: The first battle of Ohio's Senate race arrives Tuesday with a special election on a hot-button ballot measure.

title: LIVE BLOG
description: Team USA take on Sweden in last-16 of the Women's World Cup in Australia and New Zealand.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy suggests U.S. may be aiding Ukraine because of Hunter Biden
description: COUNCIL BLUFFS, Iowa — Republican presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy implied Saturday that American involvement in the war in Ukraine may be because of President Joe Biden's son Hunter Biden.

title: Simone Biles dazzles in her return to easily claim the U.S. Classic
description: Simone Biles began her first competition in 732 days by briefly running around during introductions, unsure of where she was supposed to go.

title: Twitter commandeers @music handle from user with half a million followers
description: Social network Twitter, recently rebranded as X, has commandeered the handle @music from an open-source software developer who told CNBC he created the account in 2007, and had built a community of around half a million followers there.
